alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 7:35PM CDT until May 15 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CRAWFORD AND NORTHERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 734 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cedarville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Cedarville... Natural Dam... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Dyer... Hackett... Bonanza... Rudy... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Bloomer... Figure Five... Jenny Lind... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Shibley... Rye Hill... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 17. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
